00031 #ifdef DEBUG
00032 #ifdef _WINDOWS
00033 #define YMATH_FAIL(cond,...) { \
00034     if (!(cond)) \
00035         Debug(DebugFail,__VA_ARGS__); \
00036 }
00037 #else
00038 #define YMATH_FAIL(cond,args...) { \
00039     if (!(cond)) \
00040         Debug(DebugFail,args); \
00041 }
00042 #endif
00043 #else
00044 #ifdef _WINDOWS
00045 #define YMATH_FAIL do { break; } while
00046 #else
00047 #define YMATH_FAIL(arg...)
00048 #endif
00049 #endif

00055 class YATE_API Complex
00056 {
00057 public:
00061     inline Complex()
00062         : m_real(0), m_imag(0)
00063         {}
00064 
00070     inline Complex(float real, float imag = 0)
00071         : m_real(real), m_imag(imag)
00072         {}
00073 
00078     inline Complex(const Complex& c)
00079         : m_real(c.m_real), m_imag(c.m_imag)
00080         {}
00081 
00086     inline float re() const
00087         { return m_real; }
00088 
00093     inline void re(float r)
00094         { m_real = r; }
00095 
00100     inline float im() const
00101         { return m_imag; }
00102 
00107     inline void im(float i)
00108         { m_imag = i; }
00109 
00116     inline Complex& set(float r = 0, float i = 0) {
00117             m_real = r;
00118             m_imag = i;
00119             return *this;
00120         }
00121 
00127     inline bool operator==(const Complex& c) const
00128         { return m_real == c.m_real && m_imag == c.m_imag; }
00129 
00135     inline bool operator!=(const Complex& c) const
00136         { return m_real != c.m_real || m_imag != c.m_imag; }
00137 
00143     inline Complex& operator=(const Complex& c)
00144         { return set(c.m_real,c.m_imag); }
00145 
00151     inline Complex& operator=(float real)
00152         { return set(real); }
00153 
00159     inline Complex& operator+=(const Complex& c)
00160         { return set(m_real + c.m_real,m_imag + c.m_imag); }
00161 
00167     inline Complex& operator+=(float real) {
00168             m_real += real;
00169             return *this;
00170         }
00171 
00177     inline Complex& operator-=(const Complex& c)
00178         { return set(m_real - c.m_real,m_imag - c.m_imag); }
00179 
00185     inline Complex& operator-=(float real) {
00186             m_real -= real;
00187             return *this; 
00188         }
00189 
00195     inline Complex& operator*=(const Complex& c) {
00196             return set(m_real * c.m_real - m_imag * c.m_imag,
00197                 m_real * c.m_imag + m_imag * c.m_real);
00198         }
00199 
00205     inline Complex& operator*=(float f)
00206         { return set(m_real * f,m_imag * f); }
00207 
00213     inline Complex& operator/=(const Complex& c) {
00214             float tmp = c.norm2();
00215             return set((m_real * c.m_real + m_imag * c.m_imag) / tmp,
00216                 (-m_real * c.m_imag + m_imag * c.m_real) / tmp);
00217         }
00218 
00224     inline Complex& operator/=(float f)
00225         { return set(m_real / f,m_imag / f); }
00226 
00231     inline float abs() const
00232         { return ::sqrtf(norm2()); }
00233 
00238     inline float mod() const
00239         { return abs(); }
00240 
00245     inline float arg() const
00246         { return ::atan(m_imag / m_real); }
00247 
00252     inline Complex exp() const {
00253             float r = ::expf(m_real);
00254             return Complex(r * ::cosf(m_imag),r * ::sinf(m_imag));
00255         }
00256 
00261     inline float norm() const
00262         { return abs(); }
00263 
00268     inline float norm2() const
00269         { return m_real * m_real + m_imag * m_imag; }
00270 
00271 private:
00272     float m_real;                        // The real part
00273     float m_imag;                        // The imaginary part
00274 };

00292         : m_data((void*)value,len)
00293         {}
00294 
00299     inline unsigned int length() const
00300         { return m_data.length(); }
00301 
00308     inline void* data(unsigned int offs, unsigned int len) const
00309         { return len ? m_data.data(offs,len) : 0; }
00310 
00319     inline bool set(const void* buf, unsigned int len, unsigned int offs = 0)
00320         { return copy(data(offs,len),buf,len); }
00321 
00328     static inline void fill(void* dest, unsigned int len, int val = 0) {
00329             if (dest && len)
00330                 ::memset(dest,val,len);
00331         }
00332 
00340     static inline bool copy(void* dest, const void* src, unsigned int len) {
00341             if (!(len && dest && src))
00342                 return len == 0;
00343             if (dest != src)
00344                 ::memcpy(dest,src,len);
00345             return true;
00346         }
00347 
00355     static inline bool equals(const void* buf1, const void* buf2, unsigned int len) {
00356             if (len && buf1 && buf2)
00357                 return (buf1 == buf2) || (::memcmp(buf1,buf2,len) == 0);
00358             return true;
00359         }

00427     inline SliceVector(const SliceVector& other)
00428         : m_storage(0), m_data(0), m_length(0), m_maxLen(0)
00429         { initSlice(false,other); }
00430 
00439     explicit inline SliceVector(unsigned int len, const Obj* buf = 0,
00440         unsigned int maxLen = 0)
00441         : m_storage(0), m_data(0), m_length(0), m_maxLen(0)
00442         { initStorage(len,buf,maxLen); }
00443 
00450     explicit inline SliceVector(const SliceVector& v1, const SliceVector& v2)
00451         : m_storage(0), m_data(0), m_length(0), m_maxLen(0) {
00452             if (!initStorage(v1.length(),v1.data(),v1.length() + v2.length()))
00453                 return;
00454             resizeMax();
00455             m_storage->set(v2.data(),v2.size(),v1.size());
00456         }
00457 
00465     explicit inline SliceVector(const SliceVector& v1, const SliceVector& v2,
00466         const SliceVector& v3)
00467         : m_storage(0), m_data(0), m_length(0), m_maxLen(0) {
00468             unsigned int n = v1.length() + v2.length() + v3.length();
00469             if (!initStorage(v1.length(),v1.data(),n))
00470                 return;
00471             resizeMax();
00472             m_storage->set(v2.data(),v2.size(),v1.size());
00473             m_storage->set(v3.data(),v3.size(),v1.size() + v2.size());
00474         }
00475 
00483     explicit inline SliceVector(const SliceVector& other, unsigned int offs,
00484         unsigned int len = 0)
00485         : m_storage(0), m_data(0), m_length(0), m_maxLen(0)
00486         { initSlice(false,other,offs,len); }
00487

00492         { setData(); }
00493

00503                 return m_data + offs;
00504             return 0;
00505         }

00596     inline unsigned int available(unsigned int offs, int len = -1) const {
00597             if (len && offs < length()) {
00598                 unsigned int rest = length() - offs;
00599                 return (len < 0 || rest <= (unsigned int)len) ? rest : (unsigned int)len;
00600             }
00601             return 0;
00602         }
00603         
00612     inline unsigned int availableClamp(unsigned int clamp, unsigned int offs = 0,
00613         int len = -1) const {
00614             offs = available(offs,len);
00615             return clamp <= offs ? clamp : offs;
00616         }

00631     inline bool resize(unsigned int len) {
00632             if (len <= maxLen()) {
00633                 m_length = len;
00634                 return true;
00635             }
00636             return false;
00637         }
00638 
00642     inline void resizeMax()
00643         { resize(maxLen()); }
00644 
00649     inline void steal(SliceVector& other) {
00650             m_storage = other.m_storage;
00651             m_data = other.m_data;
00652             m_length = other.m_length;
00653             m_maxLen = other.m_maxLen;
00654             other.m_storage = 0;
00655             other.m_data = 0;
00656             other.m_length = other.m_maxLen = 0;
00657         }
00658

00666             setData();

00703     inline SliceVector tail(unsigned int len) const {
00704             if (len < length())
00705                 return SliceVector(*this,length() - len,len);
00706             return SliceVector();
00707         }
00708 
00715     inline bool tail(SliceVector& dest, unsigned int len) const {
00716             if (len <= length())
00717                 return dest.initSlice(true,*this,length() - len,len);
00718             dest.setData();
00719             return false;
00720         }

00776     inline void fill(const Obj& value) {

00779                 *d = value;

00835     inline bool sum(const SliceVector& other) {
00836             if (length() != other.length())
00837                 return false;
00838             const Obj* od = other.m_data;
00839             Obj* d = data();
00840             for (Obj* last = end(d,length()); d != last; ++d, ++od)
00841                 *d += *od;
00842             return true;
00843         }
00844 
00849     inline void sum(const Obj& value) {
00850             Obj* d = data();
00851             for (Obj* last = end(d,length()); d != last; ++d)
00852                 *d += value;
00853         }
00854 
00860     inline bool sub(const SliceVector& other) {
00861             if (length() != other.length())
00862                 return false;
00863             const Obj* od = other.m_data;
00864             Obj* d = data();
00865             for (Obj* last = end(d,length()); d != last; ++d, ++od)
00866                 *d -= *od;
00867             return true;
00868         }

01066     inline bool equals(const SliceVector& other) const {
01067             return length() == other.length() &&
01068                 RefStorage::equals(data(),other.data(),size());
01069         }
01070 
01079     String& dump(String& buf, String& (*func)(String& s, const Obj& o, const char* sep),
01080         const char* sep = ",") const {
01081             const Obj* d = data();
01082             if (!(d && func))
01083                 return buf;
01084             String localBuf;
01085             for (const Obj* last = end(d,length()); d != last; ++d)
01086                 (*func)(localBuf,*d,sep);
01087             return buf.append(localBuf);
01088         }
01089 
01104     String& dump(String& buf, unsigned int lineLen,
01105         String& (*func)(String& s, const Obj& o, const char* sep),
01106         unsigned int offset = 0, const char* linePrefix = 0,
01107         const char* suffix = "\r\n", const char* sep = ",") const {
01108             const Obj* d = data();
01109             if (!(d && func))
01110                 return buf.append(suffix);
01111             if (TelEngine::null(linePrefix))
01112                 linePrefix = suffix;
01113             if (!lineLen || TelEngine::null(linePrefix))
01114                 return dump(buf,func,sep) << suffix;
01115             String localBuf;
01116             for (const Obj* last = end(d,length()); d != last;) {
01117                 String tmp;
01118                 (*func)(tmp,*d,0);
01119                 if (++d != last)
01120                     tmp << sep;
01121                 offset += tmp.length();
01122                 if (offset > lineLen) {
01123                     localBuf << linePrefix;
01124                     offset = tmp.length();
01125                 }
01126                 localBuf << tmp;
01127             }
01128             return buf << localBuf << suffix;
01129         }
01130 
01137     inline String& hexify(String& buf, char sep = 0) const
01138         { return buf.hexify((void*)data(),size(),sep); }
01139         
01151     inline String& dumpHex(String& buf, unsigned int lineLen,
01152         unsigned int offset = 0, const char* linePrefix = 0,
01153         const char* suffix = "\r\n") const {
01154             String h;
01155             return RefStorage::dumpSplit(buf,hexify(h),lineLen,offset,linePrefix,suffix);
01156         }
01157         
01173     int unHexify(const char* str, unsigned int len, int sep = 255) {
01174             setData();
01175             DataBlock db;
01176             bool ok = (sep < -128 || sep > 127) ? db.unHexify(str,len) :
01177                 db.unHexify(str,len,(char)sep);
01178             if (ok && (db.length() % objSize() == 0)) {
01179                 initStorage(db.length() / objSize(),(const Obj*)db.data(0,db.length()));
01180                 return 0;
01181             }
01182             return ok ? 1 : -1;
01183         }
01184 
01191     inline int unHexify(const String& str, int sep = 255)
01192         { return unHexify(str.c_str(),str.length(),sep); }
01193 
01198     static inline unsigned int objSize()
01199         { return sizeof(Obj); }
01200 
01206     static inline unsigned int size(unsigned int len)
01207         { return len * objSize(); }
01208 
01209 protected:
01210     // Return end-of-data pointer from start and given length
01211     inline Obj* end(Obj* start, unsigned int len)
01212         { return start ? (start + len) : 0; }
01213     inline const Obj* end(const Obj* start, unsigned int len) const
01214         { return start ? (start + len) : 0; }
01215     // Set data. Reset storage if we don't have a valid data pointer
01216     // Return true if we have valid data
01217     inline bool setData(Obj* data = 0, unsigned int len = 0, unsigned int maxLen = 0) {
01218             m_data = data;
01219             if (m_data) {
01220                 m_length = len;
01221                 m_maxLen = maxLen;
01222             }
01223             else {
01224                 m_length = m_maxLen = 0;
01225                 TelEngine::destruct(m_storage);
01226             }
01227             return m_data != 0;
01228         }
01229     // Build storage, update data. This method assumes our data is cleared
01230     // If data is given 'len' elements will be copied from it to storage
01231     inline bool initStorage(unsigned int len, const Obj* data = 0,
01232         unsigned int maxLen = 0) {
01233             if (maxLen < len)
01234                 maxLen = len;
01235             if (!maxLen)
01236                 return false;
01237             if (!data || maxLen == len)
01238                 m_storage = new RefStorage(data,size(maxLen));
01239             else {
01240                 m_storage = new RefStorage(0,size(maxLen));
01241                 m_storage->set(data,size(len));
01242             }
01243             return setData((Obj*)m_storage->data(0,1),len,maxLen);
01244         }
01245     // Build storage from slice and update data.
01246     // Clear data if requested
01247     inline bool initSlice(bool del, const SliceVector& other, unsigned int offs = 0,
01248         unsigned int len = 0) {
01249             if (!len)
01250                 len = other.length();
01251             Obj* d = (Obj*)other.data(offs,len);
01252             if (!d) {
01253                 if (del)
01254                     setData();
01255                 return len == 0;
01256             }
01257             if (m_storage == other.m_storage)
01258                 return setData(d,len,len);
01259             RefStorage* tmp = other.m_storage;
01260             if (tmp->ref()) {
01261                 TelEngine::destruct(m_storage);
01262                 m_storage = tmp;
01263                 return setData(d,len,len);
01264             }
01265             Debug(DebugFail,"SliceVector storage ref() failed");
01266             return del ? setData() : false;
01267         }
01268 
01269     RefStorage* m_storage;               // Vector storage
01270     Obj* m_data;                         // Pointer to data
01271     unsigned int m_length;               // Data length
01272     unsigned int m_maxLen;               // Max storage
01273 };
01274 
01275 typedef SliceVector<Complex> ComplexVector;
01276 typedef SliceVector<float> FloatVector;
01277 typedef SliceVector<uint8_t> ByteVector;
01278 
01286 class YATE_API BitVector : public ByteVector
01287 {
01288 public:
01292     inline BitVector()
01293         {}
01294 
01300     inline BitVector(const BitVector& other)
01301         : ByteVector(other)
01302         {}
01303 
01311     explicit inline BitVector(unsigned int len, unsigned int maxLen = 0)
01312         : ByteVector(len,0,maxLen)
01313         {}
01314 
01322     explicit inline BitVector(const BitVector& other, unsigned int offs,
01323         unsigned int len = 0)
01324         : ByteVector(other,offs,len)
01325         {}
01326 
01332     explicit BitVector(const char* str, unsigned int maxLen = 0);
01333 
01338     bool valid() const;
01339 
01346     bool get(FloatVector& dest) const;
01347 
01354     bool set(const FloatVector& input);
01355 
01364     void xorMsb(uint32_t value, unsigned int offs = 0, uint8_t len = 32);
01365 
01374     inline void xorMsb16(uint16_t value, unsigned int offs = 0, uint8_t len = 16)
01375         { return xorMsb((uint32_t)value << 16,offs,len <= 16 ? len : 16); }
01376 
01384     uint64_t pack(unsigned int offs = 0, int len = -1) const;
01385 
01392     void unpack(uint64_t value, unsigned int offs = 0, uint8_t len = 64);
01393 
01401     void unpackMsb(uint32_t value, unsigned int offs = 0, uint8_t len = 32);
01402 
01410     inline void unpackMsb16(uint16_t value, unsigned int offs = 0, uint8_t len = 16)
01411         { unpackMsb((uint32_t)value << 16,offs,len <= 16 ? len : 16); }
01412 
01421     bool pack(ByteVector& dest) const;
01422 
01430     bool unpack(const ByteVector& src);
01431 
01439     String& appendTo(String& buf, unsigned int offs = 0, int len = -1) const;
01440 
01447     inline String toString(unsigned int offs, int len = -1) const {
01448             String tmp;
01449             return appendTo(tmp,offs,len);
01450         }
01451 
01459     inline bool setSlice(const BitVector& other, unsigned int offs = 0,
01460         unsigned int len = 0)
01461         { return initSlice(true,other,offs,len); }
01462 
01468     inline BitVector head(unsigned int len) const
01469         { return slice(0,len); }
01470 
01477     inline bool head(BitVector& dest, unsigned int len) const
01478         { return slice(dest,0,len); }
01479 
01485     inline BitVector tail(unsigned int len) const {
01486             if (len < length())
01487                 return BitVector(*this,length() - len,len);
01488             return BitVector();
01489         }
01490 
01497     inline bool tail(BitVector& dest, unsigned int len) const {
01498             if (len <= length())
01499                 return dest.initSlice(true,*this,length() - len,len);
01500             dest.setData();
01501             return false;
01502         }
01503 
01511     inline BitVector slice(unsigned int offs, unsigned int len) const
01512         { return BitVector(*this,offs,len); }
01513 
01522     inline bool slice(BitVector& dest, unsigned int offs, unsigned int len = 0) const
01523         { return dest.initSlice(true,*this,offs,len); }
01524 };

01531 class YATE_API Math
01532 {
01533 public:

01542 
01550     static String& dumpFloat(String& buf, const float& val, const char* sep = 0);
01551 };

01560 inline Complex operator+(const Complex& c1, const Complex& c2)
01561 {
01562     Complex tmp(c1);
01563     return (tmp += c2);
01564 }
01565 
01572 inline Complex operator+(const Complex& c, float f)
01573 {
01574     Complex tmp(c);
01575     return (tmp += f);
01576 }
01577 
01584 inline Complex operator+(float f, const Complex& c)
01585 {
01586     return operator+(c,f);
01587 }
01588 
01595 inline Complex operator-(const Complex& c1, const Complex& c2)
01596 {
01597     Complex tmp(c1);
01598     return (tmp -= c2);
01599 }
01600 
01607 inline Complex operator-(const Complex& c, float f)
01608 {
01609     Complex tmp(c);
01610     return (tmp -= f);
01611 }
01612 
01619 inline Complex operator*(const Complex& c1, const Complex& c2)
01620 {
01621     Complex tmp(c1);
01622     return (tmp *= c2);
01623 }
01624 
01631 inline Complex operator*(const Complex& c, float f)
01632 {
01633     Complex tmp(c);
01634     return (tmp *= f);
01635 }
01636 
01643 inline Complex operator*(float f, const Complex& c)
01644 {
01645     return operator*(c,f);
01646 }
01647 
01654 inline Complex operator/(const Complex& c1, const Complex& c2)
01655 {
01656     Complex tmp(c1);
01657     return (tmp /= c2);
01658 }
01659 
01666 inline Complex operator/(const Complex& c, float f)
01667 {
01668     Complex tmp(c);
01669     return (tmp /= f);
01670 }
01671 
01678 inline String& operator<<(String& str, const Complex& c)
01679 {
01680     return Math::dumpComplex(str,c);
01681 }
01682 
01689 inline String& operator<<(String& str, const BitVector& b)
01690 {
01691     return b.appendTo(str);
01692 }
